item.title: Two killed in road accident in Raichur district
item.description:
<![CDATA[Two motorcyclists were killed when they collided with a car near Yaragera village in Raichur district on Saturday.
They were identified as 42-year-old Urkund and 45-year-old Laxman of Yaragera village.
The two were returning on the motorcycle to their village from Raichur when they collided with the car.
Urkund died at a hospital on Saturday, while Laxman died on Sunday.
A case has been registered at the Yaragera Police Station....]]>
item.author: Authors
